text: Vera Schenone (born 25 April 1940) is an Italian alpine skier. She competed in three events at the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Italy Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Piedmont
title: Vera Schenone
